channel.title: Podcasts on Sam Merrell
channel.description: Recent content in Podcasts on Sam Merrell

item.title: Discovering Podcasts
item.description: I’ve never paid much attention to podcasts. Up until a few months ago I was commuting to work by train and used that time to either read books, or play games. All of that has been great and I’ve enjoyed the time I have had to read, relax, or learn something new. Recently, I’ve had to begin commuting to work which completely threw the routine I had developed. Since I can’t really read or play games commuting, I had to find another alternative.
